participant_1.background:
I sometimes cuss in my videos because I think it makes them more entertaining, but I know that it's not appropriate for everyone.
my boyfriend is in the army.
I play the cello to express myself and connect with my best friend who lives in the city.
i used to own several casinos.
i work in car sales.

participant_2.background:
I've been growing my beard for over a year now and I love it!
my favorite place is the mountains.
My favorite exotic place is Tokyo because of the contrast between the modern city and the traditional culture.
I drink my coffee and head to work, worried about my brother who is always getting into trouble.
i can t cook.

content.text: Hi there! How are you today?
I'm doing well, thanks! Just got back from a long weekend in Tokyo. It was amazing!
That sounds awesome! I've always wanted to go to Tokyo. What was your favorite part?
I loved the contrast between the modern city and the traditional culture. It was like stepping into a whole new world.
That sounds really cool! I've heard that the food in Tokyo is amazing too.
It is! I had some of the best sushi I've ever had there.
Yum! I'm getting hungry just thinking about it.
Me too! I wish I was back there right now.
Me too! Well, I have to get to work now, but it was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great day at work!
